moves.1. e4: One of my early games at GK which won the  Game of the Month for December
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5: Being a newbie I was happy it was Giuoco Piano
moves.4. c3 Nf6 5. d4 exd4 6. cxd4 Bb4+ 7. Bd2:
Instead of castling, I tried to attack...even risking myself by over extending my pawn.
Post game analysis recommends that I should have castled
moves.10... Ne7 11. Qb3: Post game analysis again tells me that I should have castled. But then, his position is already cramped and this was the perfect time for me to launch an attack
moves.11... d6 12. e6 fxe6 13. dxe6 Nf6 14. Ng: Indeed I over extended my e pawn.
moves.18. Nxh7: but his greediness gives me an opportunity to attack his kingside
By this time, it took me a day to calculate my next move
moves.22. Bxg8 Kxg8 23. Re6 Qc7 24. Rae1: I was pretending to attack the knight
moves.24... Rae8: and he responded by protecting it
moves.25. Rxf6: ...but then all i wanted was to sacrifice my rook to renew the kingside attack
